Question: The following year, the ____s welcomed their third child, son Mark.
Hints: This person flew the plane back to friendly territory, but due to the loss of the aileron, ejection was his only safe option.
On March 22, 1956, this person was in a Boeing B-29 Superfortress, which was to air-drop a Douglas D-558-2 Skyrocket.
This person's stint at Cleveland lasted a couple of months, and by July 1955, he returned to Edwards AFB for his new job.
